# MONIQUE Cafe

> Cafe in Seogwipo Jungmun, Jeju Island, South Korea. QR menu and KakaoTalk takeout ordering system.

## About

MONIQUE is a cafe located in Jungmun, Seogwipo-si, Jeju-do, South Korea.
We serve specialty coffee, desserts, affogato, tea (Mariage Freres), and coffee cocktails.
Customers can scan a QR code to view our full menu and place takeout orders via KakaoTalk.

## Menu Categories

- **Signature**: Dense Cheesecake (Vanilla/Chestnut), Ferrero Rocher Financier, Americano, Monique Latte Signature
- **Coffee**: Espresso, Americano, Cafe Latte, Cappuccino, Vanilla Latte, Condensed Milk Latte, Cream Latte, Monique Latte Signature (DECAF available)
- **Affogato**: Affogato, Mint Affogato, Jeju Matcha Affogato (Haagen-Dazs)
- **Coffee Cocktail**: Espresso Martini
- **Non-Coffee**: Sweet Potato Latte, Chocolate Latte, Strawberry Latte, Jeju Matcha Latte, Peach Smoothie, Corn Smoothie, Hibiscus Lemonade, Green Grape Ade
- **Tea (Mariage Freres)**: Marco Polo, Wedding Imperial, Eros, Casablanca, Marco Polo Rouge (Decaf)

## Features

- QR code menu (multilingual: Korean, English, Chinese)
- KakaoTalk takeout ordering
- Google Maps integration with Naver/Kakao/Google directions
- Tumbler discount and takeout discount available

## Location

Jungmun, Seogwipo-si, Jeju-do, South Korea

## Languages

Korean (한국어), English, Chinese (中文)
